attributes.action: Make Traffic lights flash Amber During the early hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the UK nightime drivers have to put up with waiting at red lights when Nobody else is around, This becomes frustrating and sometimes the driver sets off at fast speeds to catch up.

In other countries Traffic lights flash Amber with a general rounabout rule. Give way to the right. This would cut down on engines running unnessasarily.
